basics.name: Stephen L Boettcher
basics.label: Technical Project Manager / Senior Business Analyst
res_summary: Technical Project Manager and Senior Business Analyst with over a decade of experience leading agile teams and delivering high-impact software solutions. Adept at translating complex business workflows and technical requirements into clear, actionable, and testable user stories, ensuring development teams can efficiently implement features that align with business objectives. Proven success in bridging communication between stakeholders, product teams, and engineers to facilitate clarity, alignment, and predictable delivery.

Skilled in driving product strategy and defining functional specifications that support measurable business outcomes, including a 15% improvement in user retention and a 20% increase in organic traffic. Experienced in conducting discovery sessions, analyzing data, and modeling processes to identify opportunities for optimization and operational efficiency. Strong aptitude for balancing technical feasibility with business value, ensuring solutions are scalable, maintainable, and meet user needs.

Brings a solid foundation in programming principles and modern web development practices, enabling effective collaboration with engineering teams and informed decision-making throughout the software development lifecycle. Adept at fostering cross-functional collaboration, mentoring team members, and managing iterative delivery in fast-paced environments while maintaining focus on quality, accessibility, and end-user experience.
